entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 19. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow at times near noon. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 19. Wind chill near minus 35. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21 with temperature rising to minus 16 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight with 30 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 21 with temperature rising to minus 16 by morning. Wind chill minus 35 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
